thread.section_title: Stewart Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing customer service
thread.title_full: Amazing customer service - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ashley M
title: Amazing customer service
text: My company hosts many events throughout the NYC, but when we host them at The Stewart (formerly the Affinia), I know there is nothing to worry about. At first my team was nervous about the switch, but they kept top talents such as Sylwia and Brian who alleviate the pressure of hosting an event while at the same time making us feel like special guests. By far one of my favorite venues professionally because of them, and in turn has become one of my favorite places in NYC personally!
